thread.title: BRIEF-‍Axelero Issues Bond Loan Cum Warrants And Determines Warrant Exercise Price​

title: BRIEF-‍Axelero Issues Bond Loan Cum Warrants And Determines Warrant Exercise Price​

organizations.name: axelero issues bond loan cum warrants

text:
January 10, 2018 / 7:24 PM / Updated 23 minutes ago BRIEF-‍Axelero Issues Bond Loan Cum Warrants And Determines Warrant Exercise Price​ Reuters Staff 
Jan 10 (Reuters) - Axelero Spa: 
* ‍ISSUE OF BOND LOAN CUM WARRANTS AND DETERMINATION OF WARRANT EXERCISE PRICE​ 
* ‍EXERCISE PRICE OF WARRANTS RATIFIED ON DEC 29 BY SHAREHOLDERS’ MEETING, WAS DETERMINED ON DATE HEREOF AT MARKET CLOSING AND IS 3.56 EUROS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
